sponsor: VA Palo Alto Health Care System
briefTitle: Preoperative Alignment of Total Knee Replacement
officialTitle: Alignment of Total Knee Components Using Standard or Custom Instrumentation
summary: The hypothesis of this study is that total knee alignment will be improved by preoperative planning from CT scans and the production of custom instruments compared to the use of standard instruments.

primaryOutcome.measure: Alignment of Knee - Measured Mechanical Axis From CT Data
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: postoperatively - CT done within 1 week of surgery
